trans-unit.target: A fleece jacket is a must-have in any girl's wardrobe. At POMPdeLUX we make fleece jackets that are so soft and comfortable that you might find it difficult to make her take it off. A jacket made of fleece fabric is extremely practical worn on chilly days in spring and autumn. Our fleece jackets are available from size 80 cm to 152 cm and in different colours and styles.

Outerwear is an important part of your girl's wardrobe. At POMPdeLUX there is always a wide range of jackets for girls to choose from. We have jackets to meet all tastes. We always make different styles and there is of course a wealth of trendy colours and sizes to choose from. We offer our girls' jackets from size 80 cm to 152 cm, and of course we make them – as always – in our superb POMPdeLUX quality.

Outerwear is an important part of your child's wardrobe. Our shell jackets and shell pants are part of our range of superb, high- quality technical outerwear, which is extremely safe. Our shell jackets and pants are waterproof, wind-resistant and breathable. They have lots of luxurious and very practical details, such as reflector strips, removable hood, storm flap, foot straps and pockets. Our shell jackets and shell pants are available from size 80 cm and right up to size 152 cm.

Outerwear is an important part of your child's wardrobe. At POMPdeLUX we make high-quality softshell jackets and softshell snow suits. Every model is available in many different colours and sizes. Our softshell products are, of course, both wind-resistant and waterproof, and they have lots of lovely practical features, including reflector strips, removable hood, storm flap, foot straps and pockets. Our softshell jackets are available from size 80 cm and right up to size 152 cm.

POMPdeLUX offers a broad range of girls' blouses – from toddlers to teens. We make lots of different styles and colours, and there is something here to meet every taste. POMPdeLUX makes basic blouses to wear every day – and festive and fun items for special occasions too. Our blouses are available from size 80 cm to size 152 cm, and there is plenty here to inspire you to renew your girl's wardrobe.

A warm girls' sweater is a good idea for cold winter days and cool summer evenings. POMPdeLUX offers girls' cardigans in beautifully soft fabrics. We make a broad range of colours and styles. Which is your favourite? Our girls' cardigans are available from size 80 cm to size 152 cm, and there is plenty here to inspire you to renew your girl's wardrobe.

POMPdeLUX has dresses in many different colours and cuts. You can find dresses for parties and special occasions and dresses that are perfect for everyday wear and play. At POMPdeLUX we have dresses for all girls – both big and small. All you have to do is pick your favourite. Our dresses start from size 80 cm and go up to 152 cm and there is lots of inspiration to be discovered for children’s wardrobe.

Sweatshirts are a popular choice. At POMPdeLUX there are always lots of sweatshirts to choose from. We offer super smart girls' sweatshirts. We always make sweatshirts in a beautiful fabric, which is soft and comfortable to wear. Our girls' sweatshirts are available from size 80 cm to size 152 cm.

T-shirts and tops can be worn all year round and they are lovely both in summer and winter. POMPdeLUX has t-shirths and tops in many different colours and models as well as something for both big and small girls. Our t-shirts and tops are lovely soft quality and have many great details. Find your favourite t-shirt for everyday wear or a pretty top for more festive occasions. Our t-shirts and tops sizes start in size 80 cm and go up to 152 cm and there is lots of inspiration to be discovered for children’s wardrobe.

T-shirts and tops can be worn all year round and they are lovely both in summer and winter. POMPdeLUX has t-shirths and tops in many different colours and models as well as something for both big and small girls. Our t-shirts and tops are lovely soft quality and have many great details. Find your favourite t-shirt for everyday wear or a pretty top for more festive occasions. Our t-shirts and tops sizes start in size 80 cm and go up to 152 cm and there is lots of inspiration to be discovered for children’s wardrobe.

At POMPdeLUX you will find trousers with the best fit to your child. We have a wide range of colours and models – regardless whether you prefer jeggings, jeans, baggy or slimfit trousers. Our trousers are made from lovely materials including sweat and knit fabric and you will find trousers for all occasions. Our trousers start in size 80 cm and go up to 152 cm and there is lots of inspiration to be discovered for children’s wardrobe.

Jeans come in many different models and colours. POMPdeLUX has just the fit that suits your child best. There are baggy, slimift and jeggings for both big and small girls. Our jeans have lots of great details and are strong for everyday play. Combine your favourite jeans or jeggings with a gorgeous tunic and boost up your outfit. Our trousers, jeggings and jeans start in size 80 cm and go up to 152 cm and there is lots of inspiration to be discovered for children’s wardrobe.

A jumpsuit is a smart choice for both everyday play and for more festive occasions. POMPdeLUX has chosen the loveliest jumpsuits for both big and small girls. Here you will find exactly your favourite model and colour. Use your jumpsuit over a basic t-shirt or combine it with lovely sweaters and accessories. Our jumpsuits start in size 80 cm and go up to 152 cm and there is lots of inspiration to be discovered for children’s wardrobe.

Leggings are a must-have in any girl's wardrobe. POMPdeLUX offers girls' leggings in beautiful soft materials, which any girl will love to wear. Our leggings are available in a broad range of colours and styles. Use leggings with a dress, skirt or shorts – free your mind! Our girls' leggings are available from size 80 cm to size 152 cm, and there is plenty here to inspire you to renew your girl's wardrobe.

POMPdeLUX offers skirts for girls of all ages. Choose from a wide variety of styles and gorgeous colours. Note the many great details, including prints and tulle. Combine our girls' skirts with different bottoms and tops – there are innumerable combinations – free your mind! Our skirts are available from size 80 cm to size 152 cm, and there is plenty here to inspire you to renew your girl's wardrobe.

POMPdeLUX offers shorts for all girls of all ages. Choose from a wide variety of styles and gorgeous colours. Note the many great details, including prints and tulle. Combine our girls' shorts with different bottoms and tops – there are innumerable combinations – free your mind! Our shorts are available from size 80 cm to size 152 cm, and there is plenty here to inspire you to renew your girl's wardrobe.

Tights are a must-have in any girl's wardrobe. POMPdeLUX offers many different tights in beautifully soft materials and trendy designs, which every girl will love to wear. Use tights with a dress, skirt or shorts – and, of course, our tights match perfectly with every other item in the collection. Our tights are available from size 80 cm to size 152 cm, and there is plenty here to inspire you to renew your girl's wardrobe.

Bodystockings are must-haves in your little girl's wardrobe. At POMPdeLUX we make beautiful girls' bodystockings, with short or long sleeves. They are of course made to meet Oeko-Tex Standard 100 and carry the GOTS label. Our girls' bodystockings are of course practical. They are always available in different colours and with different prints, and from size 80 cm to size 98 cm. There's plenty here to inspire you to renew your little girl's wardrobe.

At POMPdeLUX we make soft and comfortable nightwear for girls. Our nightwear collection – pyjamas, nightdresses and bodystockings – is of course made to meet Oeko-Tex Standard 100 and carries the GOTS label. Our girls' nightwear is of course practical. It is always available in different colours and with different prints, and from size 80 cm to size 152 cm. There's plenty here to inspire you to renew your girl's wardrobe.

At POMPdeLUX we make soft and comfortable underwear for girls. Our underwear collection – vests, hipsters and knickers – is of course made to meet Oeko-Tex Standard 100 and carries the GOTS label. POMPdeLUX girls' nightwear is of course practical. It is always available in different colours and with different prints, and from size 86 cm to size 152 cm. There's plenty here to inspire you to renew your girl's wardrobe.

No summer without a dip! We believe that every girl's swimsuit should have the POMPdeLUX label! Every year POMPdeLUX makes a collection of swimwear for girls, including bikinis and swimsuits, naturally with our superb quality, smart designs and lovely colours. Our swimwear is available from size 80 cm to size 152 cm, and there is plenty here to inspire you to renew your girl's wardrobe.

To put the finishing touches to your girl's wardrobe, our collection includes many cool accessories. A belt often makes all the difference to what is already a great outfit. At POMPdeLUX we make simple, good quality girls' belts to fit girls of all ages. There's plenty here to inspire you to renew your girl's wardrobe.

To put the finishing touches to your girl's wardrobe, our collection includes many cool accessories. A hat often makes all the difference to what is already a great outfit. At POMPdeLUX we make great hats for girls, available in different styles and colours – and always great quality. What would you say to a cool cap or a very practical sun hat? We make hats to fit girls of all ages and there is plenty here to inspire you to renew your girl's wardrobe.

To put the finishing touches to your child's wardrobe, our collection includes many cool accessories. Hair accessories are must-haves for girls of all ages – from toddlers to teens. Our girls' hair accessories are available in different colour combinations, which of course match our collection. There is plenty hereto inspire you to renew your girl's wardrobe.

Socks are an important must-have in your girl's wardrobe. POMPdeLUX offers many different girls' socks in beautifully soft materials and trendy designs, which every girl will love to wear. Our girls' socks carry the Oeko-Tex Standard 100 label and are available in a range of cool colours, which of course match perfectly with other items in our collection. Our socks are available in shoe sizes 20 to 38, and there is plenty here to inspire you to renew your girl's wardrobe.

Girls loves scarves and they can be worn all year round! POMPdeLUX makes scarves for girls in a selection of colours ad designs. Our scarves are always in our customary high quality fabrics. Accessories often put the finishing touches to any wardrobe and it's most definitely a good idea to have scarves in your wardrobe. Our scarves are designed to match the entire collection. Girls of all ages (including Mum!) love to wear scarves – and there is plenty here to inspire you to renew your girl's wardrobe.

To put the finishing touches to your child's wardrobe, our collection includes many cool accessories. The POMPdeLUX accessories collection includes everything from tights, socks, leggings, swimwear, bathing trunks, bikinis, hair accessories, braces and belts to mittens, hats and scarves. Our accessories match perfectly with other items in our collection and can be combined almost endlessly with smart dresses, lovely cardigans and cool trousers. Girls of all ages (including Mum!) love to wear our belts, braces, mittens, hats, scarves and hair accessories – and there is plenty here to inspire you to renew your girl's wardrobe.

A jacket made of fleece fabric is extremely practical worn on chilly days in spring and autumn. Our fleece jackets are available from size 80 cm to 152 cm and in different colours and styles.

They have lots of luxurious and very practical details, such as reflector strips, removable hood, storm flap, foot straps and pockets. POMPdeLUX offers a broad range of boys' tops – from toddlers to teens. We make lots of different styles and colours, and there is something here to meet every taste. POMPdeLUX makes basic tops to wear every day – and festive and fun items for special occasions too. Our blouses are available from size 80 cm to size 152 cm, and there is plenty here to inspire you to renew your boy's wardrobe.

For cold winter days and chilly summer evenings it is nice to have a warm jumper or cardigan. POMPdeLUX has pullovers, cardigans and slipovers in lovely soft quality and you can find a wide selection of colours and models. Find your favourite amongst fleece jackets, cardigans, blouses, sweats, slipovers and pullovers. Our pullovers and cardigans start in size 80 cm and go up to 152 cm and there is lots of inspiration to be discovered for children’s wardrobe.

Children wear polo shirts all year round. They are smart and comfortable both summer and winter. POMPdeLUX offers polo shirts in many different colours and styles so there is sure to be something to suit every boy – from toddler to teen! Our polo shirts are made in beautifully soft fabrics and have lots of great details. Find your favourite polo shirt here – to wear everyday and on special occasions. Our polo shirts are available down to size 80 cm and right up to size 152 cm, and there is plenty here to inspire you to renew your child's wardrobe.

A boy always looks smart in a shirt, and at POMPdeLUX we make shirts in many different designs, patterns and colours. We have everything you need to make the perfect wardrobe for your boy – from toddler to teen! Check out the many fine details, including chest pockets, collars, buttons and prints. Find the boys' shirt your boy is crazy about and combine it with a sweatshirt, sweater, cardigan or slipover. Our shirts are available from size 80 cm to size 152 cm, and there is plenty here to inspire you to renew your boy's wardrobe.

Outerwear is an important part of your boy's wardrobe. At POMPdeLUX there is always a wide range of smart sporty jackets for your boy to choose from. Our boys' sporty jackets are of course available in several different colours and there are naturally lots of cool details. We offer our sports jackets from size 80 cm to 152 cm, and of course we make them – as always – in our superb POMPdeLUX quality.

A warm boys' sweater is a good idea for cold winter days and cool summer evenings. POMPdeLUX offers boys' sweaters in beautifully soft fabrics. We offer many different styles. Which is your favourite? Our boys' sweaters are available from size 80 cm to size 152 cm, and there is plenty here to inspire you to renew your boy's wardrobe.

Sweatshirts are a popular choice. They are practical and cool for any boy – from toddler to teen! At POMPdeLUX there are always plenty of different styles and colours to choose from. We offer super smart boys' sweatshirts. We always make sweatshirts in a beautiful fabric, which is soft and comfortable to wear. Our boys' sweatshirts are available from size 80 cm to size 152 cm.

T-shirts can be worn all year round and they are lovely both in summer and winter. POMPdeLUX has t-shirts in many different colours and models as well as something for both big and small boys. Our t-shirts are lovely soft quality and have many great details and prints. Find your favourite t-shirt for everyday wear or a cool polo for festive occasions. Our t-shirts start in size 80 cm and go up to 152 cm and there is lots of inspiration to be discovered for children’s wardrobe.

It's great to give a boy a lovely warm gilet to wear on cold winter days and cool summer evenings. POMPdeLUX offers boys' gilets in beautifully soft fabrics. We offer several different styles. A gilet is a great way to spice up an outfit and works well everyday – and on special occasions too. Our boys' gilets are available from size 80 cm to size 104 cm, and there is plenty here to inspire you to renew your boy's wardrobe.

At POMPdeLUX you will find trousers with the best fit to your child. We have a wide selection of colours and models – regardless whether you prefer baggy, regular, slimfit, sweatpants, chinos or jeans. Our trousers are made from lovely materials including sweat and cotton and there are trousers for all occasions. Our trousers, chinos and jeans start in size 80 cm and go up to 152 cm and there is lots of inspiration to be discovered for children’s wardrobe.

Jeans must be comfortable to wear and therefore it is important to find exactly the right jeans for your child. At POMPdeLUX you will find jeans in different colours and models. Choose between baggy, regular, slimfit, sweatpants, chinos or jeans. Our trousers are made from lovely materials including sweat and cotton and there are jeans for all occasions. Our trousers, chinos and jeans start in size 80 cm and go up to 152 cm and there is lots of inspiration to be discovered for children’s wardrobe.

At POMPdeLUX you will find a large selection of lovely shorts, knickers and swim shorts. Choose between long and short styles in both sweat, denim and cotton. Your boy will be so ready for summer, beach and outdoor play. All our shorts can be combined with a cool shirt, a soft t-shirt or a smart top. Our shorts and knickers are available in sizes from 80 cm up to 152 cm, and there is lots of inspiration to be discovered for your children’s wardrobe.

Bodystockings are must-haves in your little boy's wardrobe. At POMPdeLUX we make beautiful bodystockings for boys with short or long sleeves. They are of course made to meet Oeko-Tex Standard 100 and carry the GOTS label. Our boys' bodystockings are of course practical. They are always available in different colours and with different prints, and from size 80 cm to size 98 cm. There's plenty here to inspire you to renew your little boy's wardrobe.

At POMPdeLUX we make soft and comfortable nightwear for boys. Our nightwear collection – pyjamas and bodystockings – is of course made to meet Oeko-Tex Standard 100 and carries the GOTS label. POMPdeLUX boys' nightwear is of course practical. It is always available in different colours and with different prints, and from size 80 cm to size 152 cm. There's plenty here to inspire you to renew your boy's wardrobe.

At POMPdeLUX we make boys' underwear that is soft and comfortable. Our underwear collection – vests and boxer shorts – is of course made to meet Oeko-Tex Standard 100 and carries the GOTS label. POMPdeLUX boys' underwear is always available in different colours and with different prints, and from size 98 cm to size 152 cm. There's plenty here to inspire you to renew your boy's wardrobe.

No summer without a dip! We believe that every boy's swimwear should have the POMPdeLUX label! Every year POMPdeLUX makes a collection of swimwear for boys, including bathing shorts and trunks, naturally with our superb quality, smart designs and lovely colours. Our swimwear is available from size 80 cm to size 152 cm, and there is plenty here to inspire you to renew your boy's wardrobe.

To put the finishing touches to your boy's wardrobe, our collection includes many cool accessories. A hat often makes all the difference to what is already a great outfit. At POMPdeLUX we make great hats for boys, available in different styles and colours – and always great quality. What would you say to a cool cap or a very practical sun hat? We make hats to fit boys of all ages and there is plenty here to inspire you to renew your boy's wardrobe.

Socks are an important must-have in your boy's wardrobe. POMPdeLUX offers many different boys' socks in beautifully soft materials and trendy designs, which every boy will love to wear. Our boys' socks carry the Oeko-Tex Standard 100 label and are available in a range of cool colours, which of course match perfectly with other items in our collection. Our socks are available in shoe sizes 20 to 38, and there is plenty here to inspire you to renew your boy's wardrobe.

POMPdeLUX makes a range of accessories to match each collection. Our accessories include a superb POMP bag, which can be used for more or less anything! We have super cool and strong bags. Take them with you to the beach or on a shopping trip. Pack them for a sleepover. They are great for carrying swimwear. Use one as a gift bag with a ribbon on it. It's entirely up to you! The sky is the limit with POMPdeLUX accessories.

Outerwear is of course an important part of your girl's wardrobe. At POMPdeLUX we offer a wide range of outerwear for your girl to choose from. All our outerwear is designed to keep your child warm and dry in all kinds of weather. In particular, we offer high-quality technical outerwear with safety features. Our outerwear is waterproof, wind-resistant and breathable. Every item of our girls' outerwear has lots of highly functional and luxurious details, e.g. reflector strips, removable hood, storm flap, foot straps and practical pockets. Snow suits, jackets, rain pants and fleece jackets are available from size 80 cm to 152 cm. There's plenty here to inspire you to renew your girl's wardrobe.

For each collection, POMPdeLUX creates a very broad range of outerwear for girls. Your child will find it impossible to find a favourite among our blouses, cardigans, dresses, sweatshirts, tops and T-shirts – because there are so many great items to choose from! Why not explore our cool badges, soft and tough studs, trendy colours, fantastic prints and lettering, princess tulle and gorgeous knits? Everything is made from the best materials and luxurious fabrics. Our tops are available down to size 80 cm and right up to size 152 cm, and there is plenty here to inspire you to renew your girl's wardrobe.

At POMPdeLUX we make soft and comfortable underwear and nightwear. We only use high-quality soft materials, which your girl will love to wear. Our nightwear and underwear collection is of course made to meet Oeko-Tex Standard 100 and carries the GOTS label. At POMPdeLUX, we believe that underwear and nightwear should not only be practical. We do our utmost to make lovely, fashionable underwear and nightwear. Our vests, hipsters, knickers, nightdresses, pyjamas and bodystockings are available right from size 80 cm up to size 152 cm, and there is plenty here to inspire you to renew your girl's wardrobe.

To put the finishing touches to your child's wardrobe, our collection includes many cool accessories. The POMPdeLUX accessories collection includes everything from tights, socks, leggings, swimwear, bathing trunks, bikinis, hair accessories, braces and belts to mittens, hats and scarves. Our accessories match perfectly with other items in our collection and can be combined almost endlessly with smart dresses, lovely cardigans and cool trousers. Girls of all ages (including Mum!) love to wear our belts, braces, mittens, hats, scarves and hair accessories – and there is plenty here to inspire you to renew your girl's wardrobe.

Outerwear is of course an important part of your boy's wardrobe. At POMPdeLUX we offer a wide range of outerwear for your boy to choose from. All our outerwear is designed to keep your child warm and dry in all kinds of weather. In particular, we offer high-quality technical outerwear with safety features. Our outerwear is waterproof, wind-resistant and breathable. Every item of our boys' outerwear has lots of highly functional and luxurious details, e.g. reflector strips, removable hood, storm flap, foot straps and practical pockets. Snow suits, jackets, rain pants and fleece jackets are available from size 80 cm to 152 cm. There's plenty here to inspire you to renew your boy's wardrobe.

For each collection, POMPdeLUX creates a very broad range of outerwear for boys. We have made it almost impossible to find just one favourite among our blouses, cardigans, polo shirts, shirts, sporty jackets, sweaters, sweatshirts, T-shirts and gilets – because there are so many great things to choose from! Why not explore our cool badges, soft and tough studs, trendy colours, fantastic prints and lettering, college looks and gorgeous knits? – everything is made from the best materials and luxurious fabrics. Our tops are available down to size 80 cm and right up to size 152 cm, and there is plenty here to inspire you to renew your boy's wardrobe.

In each POMPdeLUX collection there is a broad range of boys' trousers to choose from. Look no further! There are trousers, jeans and shorts right here for every occasion or purpose and any time of the year. POMPdeLUX is famous for its luxurious materials and fantastic designs. You will not be disappointed by the quality of our trousers, which are available down to size 80 cm and up to 152 cm. There's plenty here to inspire you to renew your boy's wardrobe.

At POMPdeLUX we make soft and comfortable underwear and nightwear. We only use high-quality soft materials, which your boy will love to wear. Our nightwear and underwear collection is of course made to meet Oeko-Tex Standard 100 and carries the GOTS label. At POMPdeLUX, we believe that underwear and nightwear should not only be practical. We do our utmost to make lovely, fashionable underwear and nightwear. Our vests, boxer shorts, pyjamas and bodystockings are available right down from size 80 cm and up to size 152 cm, and there is plenty here to inspire you to renew your boy's wardrobe.

To put the finishing touches to your child's wardrobe, our collection includes many cool accessories. The POMPdeLUX accessories collection includes everything from tights, socks, swimsuits, bathing trunks, braces and belts to gloves, hats and scarves. Our accessories match perfectly with other items in our collection and can be combined almost endlessly with smart sweaters, lovely cardigans and cool trousers.
